> >

> > Hey people. Sleepnowinthefire here. I wanted to share some thoughts with you. > >

> > 06.08.2016 >

> >

> > immunity >

> >
> >
> >

> > >

> >

> > >

> >

> > >

> >
> >
> > Every single one of you on Zeronet is making history right now. >
> > The days of an ICANN DNS controlled internet are coming to an end. >
> > Tell everyone you know about Zeronet. Lets make the swarm as big as possible. >
> > You have the following responsibilities: >
> >
> > 1. A proper forum for Zeronet. >
> > A reddit or Voat clone perhaps. >
> > TelescopeNova would probably be the best. >
> >
> > 2. In-browser P2P video working on Zeronet. >
> > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > That's what he wanted to put on this page. But apparently, it was covered by something else. Fixed now. Try again.^^
